org.cs2c.nginlib.ctl
接口 Controller

public interface Controller

作者：
Mikes

This interface is used to handle Nginx's running life cycle.

方法摘要
 void deploy(java.io.File zipFile, java.lang.String targetPath)
          Deploy web site into remote nginx.
 void reload()
          Reload the Nginx configure file to make it take effect.
 void restart()
          Restart the remote Nginx
 void shutdown()
          Shutdown the remote Nginx.
 void start()
          Start the remote Nginx.
 

方法详细信息

start

void start()
           throws RemoteException
Start the remote Nginx.

抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

shutdown

void shutdown()
              throws RemoteException
Shutdown the remote Nginx.

抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

restart

void restart()
             throws RemoteException
Restart the remote Nginx

抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

reload

void reload()
            throws RemoteException
Reload the Nginx configure file to make it take effect. Reloading will not interrupt the Nginx's running if it is running.

抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

deploy

void deploy(java.io.File zipFile,
            java.lang.String targetPath)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   RemoteException
Deploy web site into remote nginx. The local web site file must be in format of zip file. If remote path has the same file, the former file will be rename with subfix of "_bak". When finishing deploying, zip file should be removed.

参数：
zipFile - Web file in the format of zip in local.
targetPath - Remote host home path where to deploy.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - When reading local web site zip file fails.
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.
